0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Where is the hotel located?, 4, Rue du Soldat Maurice Benhammou 20370 Casablanca, Maroc
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Can I have the hotel location on Google Maps?, https://maps.app.goo.gl/ofpWGr49ivWAc2XE7
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, What's the neighborhood like?, 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, How far is the hotel from the city center?, The hotel is located in the city center
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Are there any public transportation options?, Yes, taxis
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Do you offer airport shuttle service?, Airport shuttle can be arranged upon request
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Can I arrange for a private transfer?,  We are pleased to inform you that we collaborate with a private chauffeur company that provides shuttles from/to Casablanca Mohammed V airport to/from our hotel for our guests at a rate of 400 MAD per trip. This company has Mercedes-Benz Vito vehicles that can accommodate up to 5 people with luggage.

The price of the airport transfer will be added to your invoice and payable upon check out. Please confirm that this is convenient for you, send us your flight information, and we will gladly arrange the airport shuttle for your arrival.
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Is parking available at the hotel, and if so, is there a fee?, We are pleased to inform you that our establishment has a private parking lot in the immediate vicinity and a valet service. We are also pleased to inform you that there is availability and you do not need to reserve your parking space.
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Are there electric vehicle charging stations?, No
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Are there subway or bus stops nearby?, Only Bus stops
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Check-in & Check-out, What is the check-in time?, 14h
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Check-in & Check-out, What is the check-out time?, 12h
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Check-in & Check-out, Can I request an early check-in?, Early check-in is subject to availability on the day of arrival.
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Check-in & Check-out, How late can I check-out? Is there a fee for late check-out?, Late check- out at 6pm MAX.  Late check-out fee: 50% of the stay rate
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Check-in & Check-out, Can I store my luggage at the hotel before check-in or after check-out?, We are pleased to inform you that we have a luggage room where you will be able to store your luggage before check-in or after check-out
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Check-in & Check-out, What documents are required at check-in?, Passeport or ID
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Are the rooms equipped with air conditioning and heating?, Yes, the suites are equipped with air conditioning and heating
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Are there any rooms with balconies?, Yes, the suites are equipped with air conditioning and heating
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Do you offer rooms with accessibility features for guests with disabilities?, 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Are there ramps and elevators?, We inform you that we only have elevators.
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, What are the conditions for baby cots and extra beds?, Cots: Children up to and including 6 years old stay for free when using an available cot.
Extra beds Children up to and including 11 years old stay for free when using an available extra bed. Children from 12 years old to 17 years old stay for EUR 30.00 per person per night when using an available extra bed.
Adults stay for EUR 50.00 per person per night when using an available extra bed
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Do you provide baby crib bedding?, Yes, we provide baby crib bedding
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, What are the room amenities?, Air conditioning, Two bathrooms, Smart TV, Terrace, Cots, Sofa beds in some suites, Wardrobe, Safety deposit box, Soundproofing, Sofa, Seating Area, Desk
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, What bathroom amenities are provided?, Bathrobe, Toilet paper, bidet, Free toiletries, Hairdryer, Slippers, Additional bathroom, Shampoo, Conditioner, Body soap, Shower cap
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Do you provide dental kits and shaving kits?, No
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Do the rooms come with a minibar or refrigerator?, The suites come with a minibar
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Are there tea and coffee making facilities in the rooms?, Coffee machine in the suites
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Are there in-room safes for valuables?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, What entertainment facilities are available in the rooms?, Smart Tv, mini bar
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Do you have Smart TVs with streaming services?, No but we have smart TV
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Can I connect my own devices to the TV?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Information, Are there charging ports in the rooms?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, What is the style of the hotel?, Art Deco
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, What type of breakfast does the hotel offer?, We offer a specific breakfast called the "L"Art" breakfast. It is a breakfast freshly prepared by our teams, combining sweet and salty elements while including Moroccan specialties. 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, What are the breakfast timings?, From 7h to 10h
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, Is there a swimming pool?, A heated indoor pool
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, Is the pool heated?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, Are there poolside services?, 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, Is there a fitness center?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, What equipment is available in the gym?, 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, Are personal trainers available?, No
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, Is there a space where I can make videoconference meetings?, Yes

0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Hotel Information, Can I use a printer?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Reservation, Can I modify or cancel my reservation after booking?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Reservation, Are there special rates or discounts for children's stays?, No
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Reservation, Are there age restrictions for children to stay at the hotel?, No
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Reservation, Do you offer family-friendly room options?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Payment and Policies, What payment methods do you accept?, Cash and credit card
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Payment and Policies, Is a deposit required at the time of booking? If yes, How much is the deposit?, No
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Payment and Policies, What is your pet policy? Are there restrictions on pet size?, Pets are not allowed

0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Connectivity and Health, Is the Wi-Fi reliable for video calls?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Connectivity and Health, Can I stream movies with the Wi-Fi?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Connectivity and Health, Do you provide USB charging outlets?, No
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Connectivity and Health, Are there international plug adapters available?, International plugs are provided upon request
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Connectivity and Health, Do you have hand sanitizing stations?, 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Connectivity and Health, Are masks and gloves available?, No

0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Security and Additional Services, Are there security cameras on the premises?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Security and Additional Services, Is there a keycard access system?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Security and Additional Services, Are there play areas for children?, no
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Security and Additional Services, Do you have a babysitting service?, No
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Security and Additional Services, Can the hotel staff assist in arranging special events or surprises (like birthday celebrations or romantic dinners)?, Yes
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Security and Additional Services, Can I arrange for a romantic room setup?, Yes

id, name, service category, service name, type, description, opening_hours
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Restaurant, L'Art, International evening, The restaurant L'ART serves international cuisine and hosts concerts from Monday to Saturday., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Restaurant, L'Art du Tajine, Moroccan, For a more traditional experience, you can enjoy delicious Moroccan dishes and mint tea at the L'Art du Tajine restaurant., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Lounge & Bar, Le 4 Lounge Bar, Bar , It's a bar with clean lines, with a lively musical ambiance provided by a DJ, where cocktails are crafted and served with passion. A design bar, each aspect of which will surprise and delight you.

It's a stylish bar, born from Palace standards, rising above conventions with modern sophistication, it's The 4 Lounge Bar., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Room Service, Room Service, Room service, Experience the luxury of 24-hour room service. Gourmet delights delivered to your door for an unparalleled stay experience. Relax and savor every moment of your getaway., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Spa & well-being, L'Ambre Spa, Spa, Massage, Hammam, Temple of relaxation, L'Ambre Spa is a 250 m² oasis where a serene atmosphere reigns, conducive to the development of your five senses.

Between soothing or energizing massages, body wraps, Hammams, saunas, energizing rituals, beauty treatments, hairstyling, and hydrotherapy, you'll find relief for your ailments., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Rooms & Accommodation, Suite Junior, Suite, Located on an upper floor, the Junior Suites at Art Palace Suites & Spa offer you absolute comfort in a warm atmosphere., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Rooms & Accommodation, Suites Supérieure, Suite, Located on an upper floor, the Superior Suites at Art Palace Suites & Spa offer you an elegant and refined setting to enjoy a peaceful stay., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Rooms & Accommodation, Suites Deluxe, Suite, Located on a high floor, the Deluxe Suites at Art Palace Suites & Spa offer even more space and are decorated in a modern style. The Leonardo da Vinci Deluxe Suite features a spacious terrace., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Rooms & Accommodation, Suites Deluxe avec Patio Andalou, Suite, Located on the 1st floor, the Deluxe Suites with Andalusian Patio at Art Palace Suites & Spa are decorated in traditional Moroccan style, guaranteeing you a complete change of scenery in the heart of the economic capital of the Kingdom., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Rooms & Accommodation, Suites Prestige, Suite, Decorated in Oriental, Art Deco, or modern style, the Prestige Suites at Art Palace Suites & Spa are located on high floors and offer sumptuous decor. These suites feature artworks, refined fabrics, and furniture for a unique experience., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Rooms & Accommodation, Suites Prestige avec Terrasse, Suite, Decorated in Oriental, Art Deco, or modern style, the Prestige Suites at Art Palace Suites & Spa are located on high floors and offer sumptuous decor. These suites feature artworks, refined fabrics, and furniture for a unique experience. Additionally, these suites boast a carefully designed terrace., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Corporate Events, Conference Rooms, , Host your corporate events in our state-of-the-art Conference Hall. Equipped with modern audio-visual facilities and flexible seating arrangements, our hall is perfect for conferences, seminars, and business meetings. Our dedicated team will ensure a successful event tailored to your needs., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Corporate Events, Meeting Rooms,  , Host your corporate events in our meeting rooms. Equipped with modern audio-visual facilities and flexible seating arrangements, our facilities are perfect for business meetings or trainings. Our dedicated team will ensure a successful event tailored to your needs., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Corporate Events, Catering, , Elevate your events with our exquisite catering services. Whether it’s a coffee break or a full-course lunch, guests will be delighted by our diverse menu featuring international cuisine, 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Corporate Events, Accomodation, , Planning a multi-day event? Provide your guests with luxurious accommodations in one of Casablanca's iconic hotels. Choose from a variety of room and suite options designed for comfort and convenience., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Request - Housekeeping, Housekeeping, , Whether you need fresh towels, a tidy room, or any other specific cleaning task, our attentive staff will promptly assist you. Enjoy a customized and convenient experience during your stay with us, 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Request - Laundry, Laundry, , Our hotel’s laundry service ensures fresh clothing for our guests. Whether you need your favorite outfit or tomorrow shirts cleaned, our efficient team handles it all. Simply drop off your items and request the landry service here., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Request - Transportation, Transportation, , We offer a convenient shuttle service to and from the airport, ensuring hassle-free transportation for our guests., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Request - Check In/Out, Check-in/Check-out, , Early check-in and late check-out are available upon request, subject to availability. Whether you want to settle in sooner or extend your stay, we’ll do our best to accommodate your needs., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Request - Concierge, Concierge, , Our concierge service is here to cater to your every need, from booking the perfect dinner spot to arranging transportation and securing tickets to events. Let us make your stay memorable by personalizing your experience with us, 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Request - Lost & Found, Lost&Found, , If you've misplaced something during your stay, our Lost and Found service is here to help. Report your missing item, and we'll make every effort to locate and return it to you as quickly as possible, 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Request - Other, Other, , Our hotel’s concierge service is at your disposal for any additional needs during your stay. Just send us your request., 
0126e2f8-5094-4940-a4c3-72e64152c6e9, Art Palace Suites & Spa, Request - Claim, Claim, , I'm truly sorry to hear that you may have experienced an issue. I'm here to help and can ensure your claim is forwarded directly to our managers for prompt attention.
Would you like to proceed with submitting your claim?,
